basics.name: Gasmi Aboubakr
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Aboubakr is a self-taught passionate developer, he loves creating things and automate whenever possible, he also enjoys the precious moments with his family and friends

work.summary: Emploitic.com is a start-up based in Algiers (Algeria), recently launched two new products for the African continent Novojob.com and Talenteo.com
highlights: Design future architecture, using containerized MicroServices (Docker/Kubernetes), communicating using REST, GRPC & PROTOBUF.
Prepare the rewrite of of existing PHP services in Golang.
Prepare the guidelines and lead the introduction and application of DevOps practices in the development process.
Prepare for the switch to a fully automated deployment pipeline.
Implemeted the automated deployment of our 3 products.
Design and implementation of Talenteo. REST API v2 using DDD patterns.
Migration of our Java based functional test to Ruby, using cucumber.
Prepare for the migration of our product's front-end to a single page application.
Prepare for the switch of our products backend to a microservices architecture.
Code reviews.
Manage and prioritize Front-End tasks and stories.
Initiated 3 internal Ruby projects used enhance the developer experience allowing for using our functional tests written in (Java/Cucumber) on the CI and developer machine with simple commands.
Designed the architecture and configuration of the company's CI platform for our products, with Gitlab (in-promise) as the CVS.
Configured and installed the entire CI platform hosted in multiple local/remote CoreOs/Ubuntu machines, backed by a total of 14 CI services.
Development of a single app multi-CV editing application using EmberJS, with a custom simplified Data layer (before Ember-Data v1 was released).
Facebook single page job searching application using jquery, api backed by php.
Initiated the company's internal JavaScript library project Elib-Core.
Initiated and contributed to the internal HTML components (widgets) project on top of the internal library Elib-Core.
Introduced assets and product build tools to the company.

work.summary: Software Development and Consulting company based in Algiers
GMS was the exclusive representant of Mercedes-Benz in Algeria, since 2010, it also represent various chinese and american cars brands like Dodge, Jeep, Chrysler and GreatWall..
highlights: Budget Management.
Development of the company's Sales Management System Using ExtJS.
Installation & configuration of multiple Windows AD Servers hosted on HyperV.
User assistance & PC's maintenance.
Network troubleshooting and maintenance.

publications.name: Talk slides about EmberJS in Algiers Tech Meetup
